originalText.text: I go to the school and it’s the best community. I became a part of a big family. The teachers are amazing and the build healthy relationships. There are a lot of clubs and teams to join that really make it a good worthy experience. i am a peer mediator and enjoy helping others in my school.

text.text: I go to the school and it’s the best community. I became a part of a big family. The teachers are amazing and the build healthy relationships. There are a lot of clubs and teams to join that really make it a good worthy experience. i am a peer mediator and enjoy helping others in my school.

originalText.text: I’m attending here currently as a freshmen, we have strands that basically divide us into classes similar to elementary or middle school. The teachers are amazing, humorous but good at their job. Things I personally don’t like are the lunch being located on the 6th floor and the gym on the 7th, the gym teachers r mid but its ok. Things i like are the advisory program which is basically a mini family they put you into. I also like the grading system and the outside lunch. Bullying happens but its not tolerated.

originalText.text: I go to school here the students here like to cause some trouble in freshman year,nothing but problems with the students they like to start drama the Dean of the school and the staff/teachers do their part when it comes to helping students w/ anything they require,these kids from MBA like to bully one another some of the times,lasts for days to one week,there's some fights as well. Teachers/staff very caring and treat students as if kids of their own
